Property.name: ExtendedGameplay
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will be able to do all of Sonic's actions with appropriate animations.

Property.name: RemoveLimitations
Property.HelpText: Remove the need for 50 rings & completed story.

Property.name: CustomPhysics
Property.HelpText: Use more appropriate physics for Super Sonic when outside of the last story.

Property.name: AlwaysSuperSonic
Property.HelpText: Sonic will always be Super Sonic.

Property.name: DetransformButton
Property.HelpText: If disabled, you will have to wait until you no longer have rings to detransform.

Property.name: WalkOnWater
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will by default walk on water. Press Y to dive.

Property.name: EyeTracking
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will be able to look at stuff like Sonic.

Property.name: HUDIcons
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will have life & 1up icons.

Property.name: CustomAnims
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic's head is centered differently so any animation editing the head position will look terrible. This uses custom animations to fix it.

Property.name: DisableAura
Property.HelpText: Super Sonic will no longer have an aura.

Property.name: ChangeMusic
Property.HelpText: The game will play Super Sonic's theme upon transformation.

Property.name: EnableTransformationVoice
Property.HelpText: Voices that play when transforming to Super Sonic or reverting to Sonic.

Property.name: EnableTikalUnusedVoice
Property.HelpText: Once the story is completed, Tikal will tell you how to transform into Super Sonic.

Property.name: Physics
Property.HelpText: The game has hardcoded behaviour for Super Sonic that breaks springs and slopes.

Property.name: Water
Property.HelpText: This patches some water issues in Emerald Coast and Lost World. Disable if custom levels are affected.
